Hello! I'm here to help you with your situation. Let's begin with:

It was a really hard hit, and my car ended up spinning and crashing into a nearby tree.
I'm sorry to hear about your accident. Can you tell me what kind of consequences you're facing now as a result of this incident?
I broke my foot you see and I'm the provider of my family. I have a physcial job so I can't work at all. This puts me into alot of pressure
